main event: Three bright round objects were observed in Guatemala, La Aurora at 1300 hrs. The objects displayed abrupt disappearance and emitted a bright light.
interesting points: The objects were described as 'mass or fragments of craft' or an unidentified object.
The UFOs disappeared abruptly and emitted a bright light.
Guatemalans reported a ground visual sighting of a UFO, describing it as the size of a grapefruit, retaining a bright orange-white color and round shape even through thin clouds.
The UFO traveled slowly overhead at 9,000 feet, making frequent definite stops, and then abruptly climbed and reduced in size before going out of sight.
The sighting lasted for 15 minutes, and there was no physical evidence or air traffic detected.
